name: Send a Calendly booking link for an exit interview via email from watched Airtable records
description: Invite a employee that has resigned to an exit interview to find out the reasons for leaving, negotiate a new contract and more. The automation uses this [Airtable Base](https://airtable.com/shrffHMSJ50xi9w5F/tblpbpqy0PAfasurk/viwhz9gjqHg3WnSxh?blocks=hide) and watches if the 'Send exit interview invite?' field is ticked. If so, a Calendly link is emailed to the employee to schedule the meeting.
